briefdescription.para: CLC keep working even if bad irq status ocurred.
CLC set software inject dq work mode.

parameterdescription.para: true-if the ADC value comes from software injection and the VD/VQ channel is required for joint use.

memberdef.argsstring: (CLC_Type *clc, clc_chn_t chn, uint32_t irq_mask, bool enable)
memberdef.name: clc_set_irq_enable

briefdescription.para: CLC set irq enable or disable.

parameterdescription.para:
enable or disable
true enable
false disable

memberdef.argsstring: (CLC_Type *clc, clc_chn_t chn, uint32_t adc_chn, uint32_t adc_offset)
memberdef.name: clc_set_adc_chn_offset

parameterdescription.para: adc channel for ADC0~3 or SDM_ADC0~7, adc from VSC must be set to 0.
adc offset for ADC0~3 or SDM_ADC0~7, adc from VSC must be set to 0.
0-clc dac output pwm duty ratio, else-clc dac output pwm period, number of clock cycles.

briefdescription.para: CLC get error adc latest value.
CLC get error adc previous0 value.
CLC software inject error adc previous0 value.
CLC get error adc previous1 value.
CLC software inject error adc previous1 value.
CLC software inject adc value. If it's not dq mode, this will trig clc calculation.
CLC set software inject dq adc value ready, this will trig clc calculation.
CLC software inject dq adc value.
